snippet: A defense lawyer for the former Goldman Sachs director Rajat K. Gupta says phone recordings show that David Loeb, a senior Goldman salesman, passed on tips to a hedge fund manager. The judge has ruled that the recording are not admissible as...
abstract: A defense lawyer for the former Goldman Sachs director Rajat K. Gupta says phone recordings show that David Loeb, a senior Goldman salesman, passed on tips to a hedge fund manager. The judge has ruled that the recording are not admissible as evidence.

headline.main: Judge in Gupta Trial Bars 2 Wiretapped Calls as Hearsay
